Package client

Class FileTransferClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.FileTransferClient
  • public class FileTransferClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client to interact with FileTransfer server.
    Author:
    huub.lievestro

      Construct a new FileTransfer client.

        public boolean downloadSingleFile​(java.io.File fileToDownload)
        Request download of a single file from the server, and start a downloadHelper to receive it.
        Parameters:
        File - fileToDownload (NOTE: file as on server, not as to write on client!)
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if succeeded

        boolean indicating if succeeded

      • checkFile

        public boolean checkFile​(java.io.File fileToCheck)
        Request hash of a single file on the server.
        Parameters:
        File - fileToCheck (NOTE: file as on client, will be matched to server!)
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if succeeded

      • compareLocalRemoteHash

        public boolean compareLocalRemoteHash​(java.io.File fileToCompare)
                               throws NoMatchingFileException,
                                      EmptyResponseException,
                                      ServerFailureException
        Compare hash of local file with hash of matching file on server.
        Parameters:
        fileToCompare - (as on client)
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if both files have same hash
        Throws:
        NoMatchingFileException
        EmptyResponseException
        ServerFailureException

        boolean indicating if succeeded

      • selectLocalFile

        Select a file from list of local files in client storage.
        Returns:
        File selected from local file storage.

      • selectServerFile

        public java.io.File selectServerFile()
        Select a file from list of local files in client storage.
        Returns:
        File (as on server), selected from server file storage.

      • matchToServerFile

        public java.io.File matchToServerFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
                               throws NoMatchingFileException
        Match file from client storage to a file on the server storage.
        Parameters:
        fileName - (as local file) to match on server.
        Returns:
        File (as on server), matching the local File.
        Throws:
        NoMatchingFileException

      • checkFreeSpace

        public boolean checkFreeSpace​(int totalFileSize)
                       throws NotEnoughFreeSpaceException
        Check if there is enough space to store the file.
        Parameters:
        totalFileSize - of the file
        Returns:
        true if there more than totalFileSize free space
        Throws:
        NotEnoughFreeSpaceException
